channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: DC’s Tournament Arc Comic Adds ‘Mortal Kombat’ and Annabelle, Cuz Why Not
item.description: Here come some new challengers to 'DC K.O.,' which just further turns the whole event into a mini-version of 'Injustice 3.'

item.title: Bitcoin Mining is Being Used to Offset Heating Costs in Greenhouses and Homes
item.description: Of course, bitcoin critics would argue there is nothing truly gained here in terms of energy efficiency.

item.title: You won't believe this, but Khadas Mind Pro mini PC actually fits an RTX 5060 Ti graphics card, 64GB RAM, and 2TB NVMe SSD in just 0.43 liters
item.description: New Khadas packs insane hardware into a 0.43 liters capacity, while leaving cooling and thermal management a complete mystery.

item.title: Minisforum beats Dell, HP and Lenovo to unveil first Ryzen AI 9 HX470 PC — AI X1 Pro-470 mini PC supports 12TB SSD storage and up to 128GB DDR5
item.description: Minisforum beats Dell, HP and Lenovo to unveil first Ryzen AI 9 HX470 mini PC - AI X1 Pro-470 supports 12TB SSD storage and up to 128GB DDR5.

item.title: Walmart expands drone delivery to hundreds of new locations
item.description: Walmart partners with Alphabet-owned Wing to add hundreds of new locations and build a coast-to-coast delivery network.

item.title: California's governor plans to set aside $200 million for state EV tax credits
item.description: The loss of the federal EV tax credits may have been a huge blow to prospective buyers, but California wants to fill that gap for its residents. Governor Gavin Newsom's proposed budget for 2026-2027, which was released on Friday, includes a "light-duty zero-emission vehicle (ZEV) incentive program" that details a one-time infusion of $200 million. According to the budget summary, this incentive program is "a critical part of the Administration's strategy to keep ZEVs affordable and accessible for all." The proposed budget still has to make it through the state's legislature later this year, bu...

item.title: RIP Guy Moon, Composer of ‘Fairly Oddparents,’ ‘Danny Phantom,’ and More
item.description: The music of Guy Moon spanned classic Nick cartoons, 'The Brady Bunch,' and 'Johnny Quest.'
